Can you please help me troubleshoot the issue by providing some more details? What's your mobile number, and how did you try to recharge (online, USSD, or through our app)? Additionally, did you receive any error message or code during the recharge attempt?

I'll do my best to assist you in resolving this issue and getting your recharge done successfully.
